title: C++ Hangman
text: My fist experiment in C++. It is very simple and easy to play!

title: Pathfinder App
text: This is a simple pathfinding visualisation app which shows how a dijkstra algorithm sorts through an array of nodes to find the end point and then displays the shortest route.

title: Test 3
text: It is in here but you are already looking at it. But click the 'View Github' button to see how it was made.
